evidence: "SeqPanther is a Python application that provides the user with a suite of tools to further interrogate the circumstance under which certain mutations occur or are missed and to enables the user to modify the consensus as needed."
"Unix and OS X Commandline Application." and usage via commands like `seqpanther codoncounter`, `seqpanther nucsubs`, indicating an end-user CLI tool for genomic analysis.

Installation instructions emphasize cloning and installing from GitHub: "Option 1: Clone repo and install locally" with `git clone https://github.com/codemeleon/seqPanther` and `pip install .`, and "Option 2: Install directly from Git" with `pip install git+https://github.com/codemeleon/seqPanther.git`. These show distribution via the source repository.
